channel.title: Requesting some help with my server :)
channel.description:
Ok Im not gonna waste time im gonna make it short 'n' sweet, I Need Help with my server... I recently made a Client which i loved so im not in the mood to let it go to waste :) this may sound wild but i wanna see if i can get some of the best coders to work w\me and together to make a server that will knock the others into the river of obliteration.
Looking for coders that know more than the average Coder from these forums :)
What im going to be working with the people on in my server is trying to-
Make a Diverse new unique server different from the rest. Set up commands and ways of exping and training no other server could think of. Full staking No nulls full ancients Good pking(challenging pking ^^) and many more
need 2-3 coders :) 1 hoster :)
those 3-4 people will become my admins
4 or 5 people who support me the whole way through- Pmods :)
MSN Me :) and we can talk KoTF@hotmail.com

item.title: Requesting some help with my server :)
item.dc:creator: @unowned unowned
item.description:
@unowned wrote:

mmm okay well i gtg for this weekend dads house… contact me on Msn… i have msn there… keep the thread alive, dont bump though. still need 2-3 more coders or maybe a Hoster dunno im thinking about King as host as he has good computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting some help with my server :)

item.title: Requesting some help with my server :)

item.description:

i did start dragonscape official but it went down after a few months.I got some exprience in java html also

my coputers speed is 3.8 gig
ram 2 gig

item.title: Requesting some help with my server :)
item.dc:creator: @unowned unowned
item.description:
@unowned wrote:

ok well i know im junior member but ive been here almost a year i believe but i just gotta say i will take u into consideration but if i can get people either a little more trusted or that know how to code, if i get a hoster i need somone for around 24 hours with a comp that could possible handle 10-100+ players get me some proof that u can code like a referal by someone and ok ill put u up there.

Read full topic
